reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get a ridiculous amount of compliments on this jacket. Very classy and cheerful. The fabric is a little weird, reminds me of some thing that costumes are made out of, and I don’t understand the buttons on the front. It looks like it is a double breasted jacket but it’s not. All that aside for the price point, I certainly won’t complain. It is a very unique jacket and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It fit better than I thought it would . I am short. I was afraid it was gonna be too long.but fine
reviews.reviewText: The vibrant colors was a plus. I wear with a black jumpsuit to dress up and then again with jeans for casual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I really was looking forward to this coat, been wanting it for a while. Decided to just go for it. First I reached out to the seller to assure I ordered the correct size. Came pretty fast and was very excited to get it.Nicely wrapped, but had a sticker on the zipper so I could not take it out the packaging, had to cut it open,Who packs items like this.Opened then I stopped and said, is this what I been waiting for, heck NO..the material was a stretch spandex material, I thought it was to be cotton material, if I read wrong then it’s my fault, if I’d known it was this type of material, I sure would not have purchased it. On top of that, it was entirely too small, that darn seller informed me of the size, I also followed the sizing chart. I got the large and to be honest XL may not have fit either, that would have been too small. I’m 190lbs, 38D. And NO I could not button it up either.If anyone of a larger body frame and large on top, advise you to go two sizes up. I immediately called for a quick refund and scheduled a pick up also. Tomorrow it’s going back to the seller. Next time give people the correct information of your very own product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL BRIGHT COLORS
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat topper I just can't get the right size. I have ordered this coat in the (2X) and it was too small especially in the chest. The buttonholes pulled when buttoned and there wasn't enough fabric, for it to close all the way especially; if you wanted the double breasted look. I ordered the coat in the size (4X) and it fits in the chest but is too long and big at the bottom. You look like you are wearing a tent on the bottom half of the coat. The arms and sleeves are too wide I will have to return the 4x. I have just ordered it in the (3X) and I will not order it again if it doesn't fit this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Jacket did what it was supposed to do a bit on the thin side material wise but color popped. It paired beautifully with my shoes and outfit of choice. Length was given. Also after wash it remained the same so overall 8 out of 10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s a fun piece
reviews.reviewText: This coat is “costume quality” but it will be perfect for an art opening that I plan to wear it to. One problem, though, is it has two parallel rows of buttons as if it were “double breasted,” but the only row of button holes are placed on the edge so that the second decorative vertical row of buttons is halfway around the wearer’s side and the buttoned row is on the vertical center of the wearer. I plan to wear it open so the button issue is not noticeable or I may just remove the extraneous buttons. Next, the fabric is very slick and nylon-y, like a cheap negligee, but unless someone comes up to the wearer and rubs the fabric in their fingers, the cheesy fabric can be overlooked. All in all, for it’s price, it’s fun for what it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone notices and compliments!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to iron out the wrinkles form packaging (I had 20 minutes from when the package arrived till leaving for a party). Everyone complimented me on the jacket. It is very lightweight but not see through. Perfect with all-black or all-white outfits to add a pop of color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Im 5'9. Size 2x/3x. I orderd a 3xl.This a cute coat for fall. It's not thick enough for winter unless you wear a heavy sweater underneath. I'm thick in bottom area so the jacket won't close all the way, but if I sized up it would be too big
